headline: NVR, Inc. (NVR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on NVR, Inc. on Invest in Quality’s Substack by Invest In Assets. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NVR. NVR, Inc.’s share was trading at $7,830.44 as of August 7th. NVR’s trailing and forward P/E were 16.56 and 17.39, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. NVR, Inc. is […]
